channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Anchore Container Image Scanner Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Anchore Container Image Scanner Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-41225|2024-08-03T12:35:49.646Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20anchore%20container%20image%20scanner%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Anchore Container Image Scanner Plugin 1.0.24 and earlier does not escape content provided by the Anchore engine API, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to control API responses by Anchore engine.
